Title: Both Sides Now
Plot: House and the team are intrigued by Scott, a man whose left brain and right brain operate independently, leaving him with two distinct personalities and no control over some of his actions. As the two sides of Scott?s brain struggle for dominance, his warring personalities make it increasingly difficult for the team to figure out what is causing the unique problem.
